fullText: With Tommy, if the dissonance is sometimes distancing, it’s also fascinating. Though I spent long stretches of the show intrigued and amused rather than earnestly rocking out, I was never not entertained. I had plenty of questions, but I also had a damn good time.

keyPhrases.quote: I also had a damn good time
if the dissonance is sometimes distancing

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: Despite acknowledging some distancing elements and being more 'intrigued' than fully engaged, the critic emphasizes consistent entertainment value and having 'a damn good time,' indicating a qualified positive experience. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses a clear sense of enjoyment and entertainment despite some reservations, leading to a positive recommendation.
